text: athava nivu, avugaligintalu doddadendu nim'ma manas'sinalliruva berenadaru agibitta balikavu (nim'mannu jivantagolisalaguvudu). ‘‘(A riti) nam'mannu matte jivantagolisuvavaru yaru?’’ Endu avaru keluvaru; heliri; nim'mannu modala bari rupisidavanu (avane a kelasamaduvanu). Matte avaru tam'ma talegalannu nim'medege valisutta, ‘‘adu (a dina) baruvudu yavaga?’’ Endu keluvaru. ‘‘Adu tumba hattirave iralubahudu’’ endu heliri
